author: Dr. Angela N. Baldwin, Joohee Cho
title: Revealing S. Korean studies show antibodies could thwart COVID-19 reinfection, spread
description: Results from two new South Korean studies shed light on whether antibodies will be a reliable form of protection against COVID-19 for those who have recovered.
content:
Results from two new South Korean studies shed light on whether antibodies will be a reliable form of protection against COVID-19 for those who have recovered from the disease.
In one ongoing study, the Korean Center for Disease Control found that 100% of 25… [+2094 chars]
